title: Apples
description: Watch and learn how to cut apples using Calphalon Self-Sharpening Cutlery.

asset.title: Apples
asset.description: Watch and learn how to cut apples using Calphalon Self-Sharpening Cutlery. For more videos, visit www.knifeskills.com
asset.author: Calphalon

transcripts:
[MUSIC PLAYING]

We're cutting an apple today. First thing that I want to do is trim of the bottom. That's going to give me a flat side. I'm going to use this 7 inch santoku knife here. The next thing I want to do is core the apple. Now that I have my different sections, I'm going to do some slicing. I'm going to be using a six inch utility knife. I'm going to grab the apple. Making my knuckle as a guide. The next is match sticks. What you want to do is cut planks put of this apple. Setting them up, you can simply cut across the other direction. That's going to be great fro something like a slaw. Similarly, I'm going to cut across the apple to make a chop. And here's our apple cut three ways, diced, matchstick, and slices.
